# Vektoren

## Übungen
### Übung 1
```{r}
r <- 5
a <- r**2 * pi
u <- 2 * r * pi
a
u
```


### Übung 2
```{r}
x <- c(4, 18, -7, 16, 4, 29, 8, -44)
x
y <- x**2
y
z <- c(x, y)
z
length(z)
```


### Übung 3
```{r}
x <- c(44, 23, -56, 98, 99, 32, 45, 19, 22)
even <- x %% 2 == 0
even
odd <- x %% 2 != 0
odd
x[even]
x[odd]
```


### Übung 4
```{r}
15:40
seq(80, 60, -3)
seq(14, 39, length.out=77)
```


### Übung 5
```{r}
rep(c("Placebo", "Group 1", "Group 2"), each=15)
```


### Übung 6
```{r}
k <- seq(0, 40, 2)
k[-c(8, 9)]
k[1:5]
k[c(2, 5, 26)]  # Element 26 gibt es nicht -> NA
k[k > 11]
```


### Übung 7
```{r}
t <- c(10, 20, NA, 30, 40)
mean(t)
mean(t, na.rm=TRUE)
```


### Übung 8
```{r}
std <- c(1, 2.22, 11.3, 7.8, 3.4, 6)
std**2  # Varianzen
```
